org.epochx.op
Interface Mutation

All Superinterfaces:
Operator
All Known Subinterfaces:
GEMutation, GPMutation, GRMutation
All Known Implementing Classes:
PointMutation, PointMutation, SinglePointMutation, SubtreeMutation, WhighamMutation
public interface Mutation
extends Operator

Mutation operators perform the task of manipulating a single program. The manner in which the mutation is made is up to each implementation.

Method Summary
 CandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram program)
          Performs the mutation operation.
 

Method Detail

mutate

CandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram program)
Performs the mutation operation.

Parameters:
program - the program to undergo mutation of its genetic material.
Returns:
the result of performing a mutation operation. null is a valid return value, which will result in a new program being selected to undergo a mutation (this does not count as a reversion).
